grow up.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to develop from being a child to being an adult
grow up.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: What do you want to be when you grow up?
grow up.translation[0].definitions[1].de: used to tell someone to behave in a more responsible way, like an adult
grow up.translation[0].definitions[2].de: to start to exist or develop gradually
grow up.translation[0].definitions[2].ex: Trading settlements grew up by the river.
